price: 53. Waa si u ugaga yeelo waxa uu Shaydaanku soo tuuro imtixaan kuwa uu ku jiro quluubtoodu cudur iyo kuwa quluubtoodu adag yihiin. Daalimiintuna (gaalada) waxay ku sugan yihiin gaalnimo iyo khilaaf fog.
arabic: لِّيَجۡعَلَ مَا يُلۡقِي ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنُ فِتۡنَةٗ لِّلَّذِينَ فِي قُلُوبِهِم مَّرَضٞ وَٱلۡقَاسِيَةِ قُلُوبُهُمۡۗ وَإِنَّ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ لَفِي شِقَاقِۭ بَعِيدٖ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: liyajʿala mā yul'qī al-shayṭānu fit'natan lilladhīna fī qulūbihim maraḍun wal-qāsiyati qulūbuhum wa-inna al-ẓālimīna lafī shiqāqin baʿīdin
